data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Martin, Jon H. (2006): The identity of Paraleyrodes perseae (Quaintance) (Sternorrhyncha: Aleyrodidae), a potential pest of fruit trees in the United States and beyond. Zootaxa 1128: 35-47, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.171844
